I'm not interested in marriage, and archery is my passion.
one of my favorite shows is face off on syfy.
I want a new home that is affordable and close to work so I can save money and keep my financial troubles a secret from my parents.
i read a lot.

content.text: Hi, what's your favorite thing to do on a rainy day?
I love to sew. I design and make clothes for myself and friends.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to sew.
It's really not that hard. There are a lot of great tutorials online.
I'll have to check that out. Thanks for the tip.
No problem. What do you like to do on rainy days?
I usually like to watch movies or read.
What kind of movies do you like to watch?
I like to watch action movies and mystery movies.
I like those too. I just watched a good mystery movie the other day. It was called "The Invisible Man".
I've heard good things about that movie. I'll have to check it out.
Yeah, it was really good. I hope you enjoy it if you decide to watch it.
